rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Acting Chairman Nilny is so stubborn, mo!
We're going to lose out on profitable deals, mo!

rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0002
rows.name:
He told us to sell at a fair price no matter what.
That's not how a merchant does things, mo!

rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If there's a shortage, you jack up the prices
like crazy and make a huge profit, mo!
That's the merchant way, mo!

rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Things were good under the previous chairman and Chairman Bahn, mo.
They'd let us do anything for a profit, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0005
rows.name:
O-of course, Chamomo would never do anything criminal, mo!
Even a merchant is finished if they get caught, mo!

rows.label: tlk42100149_03_msg0006
rows.name:
M-merchants live and die by trust and reliability, mo!
You should only bend the law to the breaking point, mo!
